attributes.action: repeal one law a day for the next 365 days
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the last 10 years the government has introduced more new laws than ever before.
It's time to lighten the statute books and repeal some of the badly worded and badly implemented recent legislation.
More importantly it's time to repeal the laws that continue to chip away at our democratic rights and freedoms, parts of the 2005 SOCPA act, most of the terrorist threat based legislation, etc...
